languages.text: Это место хорошо известно имперским картографам и хронистам. Когда-то давно планета была процветающим аванпостом, соперницей Футфола. В прошлом на ее орбите находилась циклопическая станция-гробница — место упокоения Корнелиуса Сотто, одного из первооткрывателей Простора Коронус. Именно она подарила название системе.

traits.locale_text: Это место хорошо известно имперским картографам и хронистам. Когда-то давно планета была процветающим аванпостом, соперницей Футфола. В прошлом на ее орбите находилась циклопическая станция-гробница — место упокоения Корнелиуса Сотто, одного из первооткрывателей Простора Коронус. Именно она подарила название системе.

languages.text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.
languages.original_text: Это место хорошо известно имперским картографам и хронистам. Когда-то давно планета была процветающим аванпостом, соперницей Футфола. В прошлом на ее орбите находилась циклопическая станция-гробница — место упокоения Корнелиуса Сотто, одного из первооткрывателей Простора Коронус. Именно она подарила название системе.

traits.locale_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous Imperium outpost capable of eclipsing Footfall. There was a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. It gave its name to the entire system.

Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous Imperium outpost capable of eclipsing Footfall. There was a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. It gave its name to the entire system.

Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

languages.text: Les cartographes et les chroniqueurs de l'Imperium connaissent bien cet endroit. Il y a longtemps, la planète était un avant-poste prospère pouvant éclipser même Castel. Une immense station-nécropole gravitait autour d'elle : il s'agissait de la dernière demeure de Cornélius Sotto, l'un des découvreurs des Étendues de Koronus. Le tombeau a donné son nom à tout le système.
languages.original_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

traits.locale_text: Les cartographes et les chroniqueurs de l'Imperium connaissent bien cet endroit. Il y a longtemps, la planète était un avant-poste prospère pouvant éclipser même Castel. Une immense station-nécropole gravitait autour d'elle : il s'agissait de la dernière demeure de Cornélius Sotto, l'un des découvreurs des Étendues de Koronus. Le tombeau a donné son nom à tout le système.

languages.text: 帝国の地図製作者や年代記製作者は、この場所をよく知っている。はるか昔、この惑星はフットフォールをも凌ぐほど繁栄した前哨基地だった。その軌道上にはかつて巨大なトゥーム・ステーションがあり、コロヌス・エクスパンスの発見者のひとりであるコルネリウス・ソットの永眠の地となっていた。その墓が、この星系全体の名前の由来となった。
languages.original_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の地図製作者や年代記製作者は、この場所をよく知っている。はるか昔、この惑星はフットフォールをも凌ぐほど繁栄した前哨基地だった。その軌道上にはかつて巨大なトゥーム・ステーションがあり、コロヌス・エクスパンスの発見者のひとりであるコルネリウス・ソットの永眠の地となっていた。その墓が、この星系全体の名前の由来となった。

languages.text: 帝国的制图师和史学家对这个地方非常熟悉。很久以前，这颗行星上曾有一座繁荣的殖民地，甚至可以让落脚港黯然失色。这个星系的轨道上曾经有一座巨大的陵墓。科罗努斯扩区其中一位发现者，科尼利厄斯·索托，就在这座陵墓中长眠，而整个星系也是以那座陵墓命名的。
languages.original_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

traits.locale_text: 帝国的制图师和史学家对这个地方非常熟悉。很久以前，这颗行星上曾有一座繁荣的殖民地，甚至可以让落脚港黯然失色。这个星系的轨道上曾经有一座巨大的陵墓。科罗努斯扩区其中一位发现者，科尼利厄斯·索托，就在这座陵墓中长眠，而整个星系也是以那座陵墓命名的。

languages.text: Los cartógrafos y cronistas del Imperium conocen bien este lugar. Hace mucho tiempo, el planeta era un próspero puesto avanzado capaz de eclipsar incluso a Paso. En su órbita había una estación de tumbas ciclópeas, lugar de descanso final de Cornelius Sotto, uno de los descubridores de la Extensión de Koronus. La tumba dio nombre a todo el sistema.
languages.original_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

traits.locale_text: Los cartógrafos y cronistas del Imperium conocen bien este lugar. Hace mucho tiempo, el planeta era un próspero puesto avanzado capaz de eclipsar incluso a Paso. En su órbita había una estación de tumbas ciclópeas, lugar de descanso final de Cornelius Sotto, uno de los descubridores de la Extensión de Koronus. La tumba dio nombre a todo el sistema.

languages.text: Kartographen und Chronisten des Imperiums kennen diesen Ort gut. Vor langer Zeit war der Planet ein wohlhabender Außenposten, der selbst Footfall übertraf. In seinem Orbit gab es eine zyklopische Gruftstation, die letzte Ruhestätte von Cornelius Sotto, einem der Entdecker der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Die Gruft gab dem gesamten System seinen Namen.
languages.original_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.

traits.locale_text: Kartographen und Chronisten des Imperiums kennen diesen Ort gut. Vor langer Zeit war der Planet ein wohlhabender Außenposten, der selbst Footfall übertraf. In seinem Orbit gab es eine zyklopische Gruftstation, die letzte Ruhestätte von Cornelius Sotto, einem der Entdecker der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Die Gruft gab dem gesamten System seinen Namen.

languages.text: İmparatorluk haritacıları ve vakanüvisleri burayı iyi bilir. Uzun zaman önce bu gezegen, Binliman'ı bile gölgede bırakacak kadar gelişmiş bir karakoldu. Yörüngesinde devasa bir kabir istasyonu vardı. Burası, Koronus Enginliği'nin keşfedenlerden Cornelius Sotto'nun son istirahatgâhıydı. Bu kabir, tüm sisteme adını vermişti.
languages.original_text: Imperium cartographers and chroniclers know this place well. Long ago the planet was a prosperous outpost capable of eclipsing even Footfall. There used to be a cyclopean tomb station on its orbit, the final resting place of Cornelius Sotto, one of the discoverers of the Koronus Expanse. The tomb gave its name to the entire system.
